name: TimeLine Walker Dark World
description:
There is such a race, they have endless lives, their fun is to travel through parallel time and space, experience different lives, they are called ""time walkers"", and this time, they came to a place where they can learn to fight. Time and space of skill and magic

Players will lead 4 timewalkers into the dungeon maze, learn various skills in this world through battles, and switch to various occupations after the realization.

The game is a Roguelike strategy type. Every time you enter the dungeon, you can re-select different skills and occupations. The monsters and rewards in the dungeon are also randomly generated. Our goal is to collect resources in the dungeon to unlock more abilities and occupations. And more dungeons, in the process, players no longer need to go through cumbersome operations to fight, all combat processes will be completed automatically by AI, and players only need to make decisions on the distribution of income after the battle is over.
